label: clinical_signal_03_dx_pain_management_trial_016
content:
## 2024-06-17 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment
- Total Enrolled: 107
- Active: 98
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 42
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 9

### Enrollment by Treatment Arm
- Multimodal: 35
- Standard: 35
- Placebo: 37

### Efficacy By Arm
- Multimodal VAS Pain Score Mean: 5.5
- Multimodal VAS Pain Score SD: 1.1
- Multimodal Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 32.2
- Multimodal Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 8.7
- Multimodal Six Minute Walk Test (meters) Mean: 335.0
- Multimodal Six Minute Walk Test (meters) SD: 38.0
- Multimodal Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 26.8
- Multimodal Grip Strength (kg) SD: 5.9
- Multimodal Sleep Quality Index Mean: 5.6
- Multimodal Sleep Quality Index SD: 0.9
- Multimodal Rescue Med Doses per Week Mean: 3.2
- Multimodal Rescue Med Doses per Week SD: 2.3

- Standard VAS Pain Score Mean: 5.6
- Standard VAS Pain Score SD: 1.5
- Standard Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 44.6
- Standard Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 10.5
- Standard Six Minute Walk Test (meters) Mean: 304.0
- Standard Six Minute Walk Test (meters) SD: 51.0
- Standard Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 23.1
- Standard Grip Strength (kg) SD: 4.2
- Standard Sleep Quality Index Mean: 4.4
- Standard Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.0
- Standard Rescue Med Doses per Week Mean: 5.5
- Standard Rescue Med Doses per Week SD: 1.7

- Placebo VAS Pain Score Mean: 6.7
- Placebo VAS Pain Score SD: 1.7
- Placebo Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 46.8
- Placebo Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 5.7
- Placebo Six Minute Walk Test (meters) Mean: 274.0
- Placebo Six Minute Walk Test (meters) SD: 38.0
- Placebo Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 20.0
- Placebo Grip Strength (kg) SD: 4.6
- Placebo Sleep Quality Index Mean: 3.8
- Placebo Sleep Quality Index SD: 0.8
- Placebo Rescue Med Doses per Week Mean: 6.4
- Placebo Rescue Med Doses per Week SD: 1.3

### Physical Therapy
- Sessions Scheduled: 218
- Sessions Attended: 183
- Attendance Rate (%): 89.7

### Safety Labs
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) Mean: 13.5
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) SD: 1.1
- WBC (k) Mean: 5.7
- WBC (k) SD: 1.3
- Platelets (k) Mean: 223
- Platelets (k) SD: 45
- Serum Creatinine (mg/dL) Mean: 0.91
- Serum Creatinine (mg/dL) SD: 0.17
- Blood Glucose (mg/dL) Mean: 107.0
- Blood Glucose (mg/dL) SD: 17.0
- ESR (mm/hr) Mean: 11.0
- ESR (mm/hr) SD: 9.0

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: PM-AE-1690, Description: dizziness, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: multimodal
- AE ID: PM-AE-1681, Description: dizziness, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: multimodal

### Protocol Deviations
- PD ID: PM-PD-1605, Description: VAS assessment outside scheduled window, Severity: minor

### Events
- Physical therapy schedule coordinated across 19 sites
- Randomization module updated for new enrollment block

### Notes
- Week 16: Pain management assessments on track. 107 subjects enrolled across treatment arms. Functional outcomes within expected ranges.
